page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE.........
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICHOLAS by NICHOLAS HAVEY EVERY MORNING I GET UP AND WASH MY HANDS AND FACE.THEN I GET DRESSED AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST.FOR MY BREAKFAST I HAVE SUGAR PUFFS.AFTER MY BREAK I CLEAN MY TEETH.THEN IT IS TIME FOR SCHOOL.I PUT ON MY COAT PICK UP MY BAG AND GO TO MY NANNA'S.WHEN MY FRIENDS COME I SAY GOODBYE TO MY NANNA ,SHE GIVES ME GIVES ME 10p AND I GO TO THE SHOP .THEN I GO TO THE SHOP AND SPEND MY MONEY AND GO TO CATCH THE BUS.I GET ON AND TALK TO MY FRIENDS JEREMY AND NAT .WHEN WE GET TO SCHOOL I GO INTO THE PLAY GROUND AND HAVE A GAME OF SOMETHING.THEN WE GO INTO THE CLASSROOM.SIR CALLES THE REGISTER WHILE WE DO OUR VOCABULARY.AFTER A WHILE WE ALL GO TO ASSEMBLY.WHEN WE ARE IN THE HALL WE ALL SAY GOOD MORNING.THEN WE SING A HYMN.
